name: Space War, Project
description:
The Crimson clan is out for blood, yours. The only hope for Clan Agape is Crimson's defeat. Take the wheel cheif Kai, it is up to you to save your clan

 Choose your side: The "peace loving" Crimson andd take over the Galexy, or Agape that fights for love.

 Choose wisely.

I am brand new to game development, so it is kind of basic right now, as I progress in the program I am attending, I will go back and make this game so much better.
